TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AdRotator extends System.Web.UI.MobileControls.MobileControl

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供用于在移动页上显示随机选择的广告的服务器控件。

span.span: Provides a server control to display a randomly selected advertisement on a mobile page.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使用相同的配置文件作为 Web 窗体类。The class uses the same configuration file as the Web Forms class. 移动控件公开的许多相同的属性和事件作为控件，以及它将添加移动功能。The mobile control exposes many of the same properties and events as the control, plus it adds mobile capability. 每当刷新页面，更改显示的广告。The displayed advertisement changes whenever the page is refreshed. 属性指定包含公布信息的 XML 文件的位置。The property specifies the location of an XML file that contains advertisement information. 此文件必须驻留在应用程序域中。This file must reside within the application domain. 出于安全目的，XML 文件应在 App_Data 文件夹中，配置为不允许用户直接访问 XML 文件。For security purposes, XML files should be in the App_Data folder, which is configured to not allow users direct access to XML files. 如果属性为空，控件生成一个分行标记作为占位符。If the property is empty, the control generates a single break tag as a placeholder. 如果不希望显示广告，这很有用。This is useful when you do not want to display an advertisement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例由两部分组成： ASP.NET 移动 Web 窗体页中`.aspx`文件和一个 XML 文件。The following code example consists of two parts: an ASP.NET mobile Web Forms page in an `.aspx` file and an XML file. `.aspx`文件使用名为的文件`ads.xml`若要轮换基于各个广告属性。The `.aspx` file uses a file named `ads.xml` to rotate through various advertisements based on the property. 如果你提供映像。 例如，它们将显示;否则为控件显示的值的播发的属性。If you provide the images for the example, they will be displayed; otherwise, the control displays the value of the property for the advertisements. 当用户刷新移动 Web 窗体页时，该页显示下一步随机选择的播发，基于。When the user refreshes the mobile Web Forms page, the page displays the next randomly selected advertisement, based on the . 该示例还演示如何使用[\<选择 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素来重写属性，如果用户的浏览器要求 WML 标记，以及如何将图像的映射`src`和`href`属性到 XML 中的数据文件中使用和属性，分别。The example also shows how to use a [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element to override the properties if the user's browser requires WML markup, and how to map the image's `src` and `href` attributes to the data in the XML file using the and properties, respectively. 尽管该示例使用函数来确定浏览器是否要求 WML (`isWML11`)，而是可以使用 Web.config 文件来定义.NET Framework 自动使用来做出判断为您的元素：Although the example uses a function to determine whether the browser requires WML (`isWML11`), you can instead use a Web.config file to define a element that the .NET Framework automatically uses to make the determination for you: > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). `.aspx`文件：The `.aspx` file: [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileAdRotatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/CS/MobileHome.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileAdRotatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/VB/MobileHome.aspx#1)] 该示例`ads.xml`文件 (这必须位于**App_Data**文件夹):The sample `ads.xml` file (which must be located in the **App_Data** folder): [!code-xml[MobileAdRotatorSample#2](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/Common/ads.xml#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置属性，则会发生此事件后已从文件中选择播发。If the property is set, this event occurs after the advertisement has been selected from the file. 事件处理程序接收包含显示播发的属性的属性。The event handler receives an property that contains the properties of the advertisement being displayed. 下表显示提供的信息的属性特定于此事件。The following table shows the properties that provide information specific to this event. |PropertyProperty|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||返回包含从 XML 文件后提取的所有播发属性的字典引发事件。Returns the dictionary that contains all the advertisement properties extracted from an XML file after the event is raised.| ||指定的替换文字和工具提示 （如果支持的浏览器） 中呈现控件。Specifies the alternate text and ToolTip (if supported by the browser) to be rendered in the control.| ||指定要在呈现的图像控件。Specifies the image to be rendered in the control.| ||指定单击播发时，浏览器导航到的 URL 引用。Specifies the URL reference that the browser navigates to when the advertisement is clicked.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例处理事件，并只为一个更大示例的一部分类概述。The following code sample handles the event, and is only part of a larger example for the class overview. [!code-csharp[MobileAdRotatorSample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/CS/MobileHome.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[MobileAdRotatorSample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/VB/MobileHome.aspx#3)]

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("").

span.span: The path to the XML file containing the properties of the advertisements to render in the control.

para.span: 出于安全目的，XML 文件应该放置在 App_Data 文件夹中，该文件夹配置为不允许用户直接访问 XML 文件。

span.span: For security purposes, XML files should be placed in the App_Data folder, which is configured to not allow users direct access to XML files.

summary.span: 返回广告中的从中检索图像 URL 的元素名。

span.span: The default value is "ImageUrl".

span.span: The element name from which the image URL is retrieved for an advertisement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有多种用途在源 XML 文件中，可以创建元素。You can create elements in the source XML file for a variety of purposes. 例如，你可能想要移动的页面和 Web 页，使用相同的 XML 文件，但想要为每个不同的图像文件。For example, you may want to use the same XML file for both mobile pages and Web pages, but want a different image file for each one. 使用属性来指定想要使用的图像 URL XML 文件中的元素。Use the property to specify which element in your XML file you want to use for the image URL. 您还可以使用单独[\<选择 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素重写此设置以显示播发的备用图像。You can also use separate [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) elements to override this setting to show alternate images for the advertisement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性从 XML 文件中的记录中选择特定的项。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to select a specific item from a record in the XML file. 可以从获取图像 URL 的值，此.aspx 文件指定``元素的 XML 文件，并使用[\<选择 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素来选择不同的图像 URL，如果用户的浏览器要求 WML标记。This .aspx file specifies that the value for the image URL can be obtained from the `` element of the XML file, and uses a [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element to select a different image URL if the user's browser requires WML markup. `.aspx`文件：The `.aspx` file: [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileAdRotatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/CS/MobileHome.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileAdRotatorSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/VB/MobileHome.aspx#1)] 该示例`ads.xml`文件 (这必须位于**App_Data**文件夹):The sample `ads.xml` file (which must be located in the **App_Data** folder): [!code-xml[MobileAdRotatorSample#2](~/samples/snippets/common/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/Common/ads.xml#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeywordFilter { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.KeywordFilter : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置可用于从广告文件中筛选广告的类别关键字。

span.span: Gets or sets a category keyword that you can use to filter advertisements from an advertisement file.

summary.span: 默认值为空字符串("")。

span.span: The default is an empty string ("").

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

value.span: 用来在指定的类别中标识广告的关键字。

span.span: The keyword used to identify advertisements within a specific category.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性具有数据，并且此属性具有的内容，控件选择具有匹配关键字的播发。If the property has data and this property has content, the control selects an advertisement with a matching keyword. 如果属性具有数据，并且此属性具有内容，但此属性和文件之间没有关键字匹配、 空白图像显示并生成一个跟踪警告。If the property has data and this property has content but there is no keyword match between this property and the file, a blank image displays and a trace warning is generated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以将集合中的映像首选项设置文件中引用的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the preference from a collection of images in the file referred by the property. 有关完整的示例代码，请参阅类概述。For the complete sample code, see the class overview. [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileAdRotatorSample#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/CS/MobileHome.aspx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileAdRotatorSample#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileAdRotatorSample/VB/MobileHome.aspx#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用[\<选择 >](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素覆盖此设置以显示播发的备用 Url。You can use [\](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) elements to override this setting to show alternate URLs for the advertisement. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性设置为播发的目标 URL。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to set the target URL for the advertisement. 有关完整的示例代码，请参阅类概述。For the complete sample code, see the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承的类可以重写此方法以执行其他任务。Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks. 例如，可以使用其他条件来筛选如何播发选择的控件，或者可以记录出于计费目的播发。For example, you can use other criteria to filter how an advertisement is chosen by the control, or you can record the advertisement for billing purposes.
